title: 94/566/EC: Commission Decision of 27 July 1994 amending Decision 87/131/EEC authorizing a method for grading pig carcases in the Netherlands (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 July 1994 amending Decision 87/131/EEC authorizing a method for grading pig carcases in the Netherlands (Only the Dutch text is authentic) (94/566/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Article 1a of Decision 87/131/EEC is hereby deleted.

This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1994.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 301, 20. 11. 1984, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 51, 20. 2. 1987, p. 50.
(4) OJ No L 39, 15. 2. 1992, p. 44.
